[[File:Photograph of a toe infection.jpg|left|thumb|Photograph of a toe infection]]

properties.question: What is the most likely cause of an infection in a toe, as depicted in the provided photograph?
properties.option_a: A bacterial infection due to a puncture wound.
properties.option_b: A viral infection from a common cold.
properties.option_c: A fungal infection from athlete's foot.
